name: Panna cotta
instructions: - Put gelatin in cold water for 5-10 min.
- Meanwhile heat up the cream along with the sugar.
- When it boils, turn off the stove and mix in the gelatin and vanilla.
- Pour it into a mold or a glass, refrigerate for at least 3h
variants: This recipe is very similar to variations of Blancmange without almonds.
